Seal characters (1)

畟字的基本解释

畟
cè
〔畟畟〕深耕入地的样子（一说疾速前进的样子）。

畟
jì
古同“稷”，五谷总称。

畟字的汉语字典释义

[①]［cè］
［《廣韻》初力切，入職，初。］
［《廣韻》子力切，入職，精。］
(1)见“畟畟”。
(2)清晰。参见“畟然”。
(3)整齐貌。
(4)正直。
(5)博具。即骰子。参见“骰子”、“瓊畟”。

畟字的康熙字典解释

【午集上】【田字部】　畟； 康熙笔画：10； 页码：页761第17
【廣韻】初力切【集韻】【韻會】察色切，?音測。【說文】治稼畟畟進也。【爾雅·釋訓】畟畟，耜也。【註】言嚴利。【詩·周頌】畟畟良耜。【傳】畟畟，猶測測也。【釋文】嚴利也。　又【集韻】節力切，音卽。義同。

畟字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
畟字的起名意思

深耕入地的样子或疾速前进的样子，也指五谷的简称。

sharp
Basic explanation of words
sharp
cè
〔畟畟〕The state of ploughing deep into the ground (in other words, the state of advancing quickly).
sharp
jì
In ancient times, "Ji" is the general term for grains.
sharp
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［cè］
["Guangyun" Beginning, Entry, Beginning. ]
["Guangyun" is a sublime, entry-level, fine-tuned. ]
(1) See "畟畟".
(2) Clear. See "Shu Ran".
(3) Neat and neat appearance.
(4) Integrity.
(5) Bo tools. That is, dice. See "Dice", "Qiong".
sharp
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Won Collection 1] [Tian Zi Department] 　畟; Kangxi Strokes: 10; Page Number: Page 761 17
[Guangyun] Chuliqie [Jiyun] [Yunhui] Observe the color and cut, and measure the sound. 【Said the text】Zhi Jia has just entered. 【Erya·Shixun】Suddenly, Xiaye. [Note] Strictly speaking. 【Poetry·Song of Zhou】Being wise. [Biography] It's still a matter of testing. [Explanation] Yan Li also.　[Jiyun] section force cut, sound 卽. The same meaning.
sharp

Name meaning
The state of ploughing deep into the ground or the state of moving fast, also refers to the abbreviation of five grains.
cè, jì
